attributes.background: Don't ban the Burka! It is a religious item. Regardless if it is a religious item that is not compulsory, there should be no ban placed on it. Banning the Burka is like banning an entire part of a religion and this SHOULD NOT HAPPEN!

rejection.details:
The Government has already stated that it has no intention to ban face coverings. You can find out more in the response to this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/131481
